name: Clickart.ai
description: ClickArt is a collaborative canvas allowing artists worldwide to paint onto an ever evolving piece of art. Clickart is a dynamic project, focused on building an ecosystem around consumer AI. Key features include a drawing generator, NFT marketplace, and a growing presence on various social media platforms. The project has been developed in phases. Phase 1, which included the development of the project's concept, logo, tokenomics, website, social media presence, and the launch of $CLICKART, has been completed. Phase 2 focuses on community growth through contests and giveaways, launching a drawing generator, initiating marketing campaigns, and reaching 5,000 holders. Phase 3 will see the launch of an NFT marketplace, listings on Coingecko and Coinmarketcap, and further marketing campaigns. Phase 4 plans to expand the project to a new App AI Platform, increase social media presence, and utilize Facebook and Google Ads. DRAWING you can unleash your creativity and experience the magic of AI-generated art DOWNLOAD Using our proprietary Blockmap image encoding, all the artwork drawn on clickart can keep for yourself NFT MARKETPLACE ClickArt provides a zero-fee gasless NFT mint, allowing artists to easily create and sell their artwork on our platform without incurring any additional costs.
